data.Title: Yelp Sues Google for Anticompetitive Behavior
data.Description: Yelp has filed an antitrust lawsuit against Google, alleging anticompetitive practices that harm consumer choice.

data.Title: Google August 2024 Core Update Impact and Analysis
data.Description: The Google August 2024 core update has significantly impacted website rankings, with analysis showing that 81 out of 390+ heavily affected sites have recovered.

data.Title: Google Discover Penalizes Sites with Misleading Content
data.Description: Google has started penalizing websites with misleading content in Google Discover, enforcing policies to maintain content quality.

data.Title: Google Local Service Ads Review Links to Expire
data.Description: Google Local Service Ads review links will now expire, and businesses are advised to use Google Business Profile review links instead.

data.Title: Looker Studio Loses Access to Google Ads Auction Insights Data
data.Description: Looker Studio users have reported losing access to Google Ads Auction Insights data, impacting their ability to analyze ad performance.

data.Title: Google Ads Introduces "Internal Tools" Button
data.Description: Google Ads has introduced a new "Internal tools" button, the purpose of which is currently unclear.

data.Title: Google's Shade Structure Discs Raise Privacy Concerns
data.Description: Google's shade structure discs are reportedly engraved with search queries, raising concerns about data privacy and collection practices.

data.Title: Google Gemini AI Introduces "Custom Gems"
data.Description: Google's Gemini AI now includes "Custom Gems," a feature allowing users to create personalized AI experts for specific topics.

data.Title: Baidu Restricts Content Scraping for AI Training
data.Description: Baidu has updated its Baike service to prevent Google and Bing from scraping its content for AI training purposes, raising questions about data access and competition.

data.Title: Google Ads Merchant Center Gets AI Tools and Reporting Updates
data.Description: Google Ads Merchant Center introduces new AI tools, summaries, and reporting features to enhance campaign management and analysis.

data.Title: U.S. Retail Ecommerce Sales Grow in Q2 2024
data.Description: U.S. ecommerce sales reached $291 billion in Q2 2024, representing 16% of total retail sales and indicating continued growth in online shopping.

data.Title: GiG Acquires SEO Specialist Titan Inc.
data.Description: Gaming Innovation Group (GiG) has completed the acquisition of SEO specialist Titan Inc. for an initial payment of $1.2 million.

data.Title: Brave Lays Off Employees Amidst AI and Search Competition
data.Description: Web browser and search engine startup Brave has laid off 27 employees, highlighting the challenges of competing in the AI and search market.

data.Title: Google Lens Rolls Out to Chrome Address Bar
data.Description: Google Lens is now widely available on Chrome desktop, accessible directly from the address bar for image recognition and search.

data.Title: Google Introduces YouTube Creator-Based Audience Targeting
data.Description: Advertisers can now create remarketing lists based on viewers of specific YouTube creator videos, expanding reach and targeting options.

data.Title: Criteo CEO Megan Clarken Announces Departure
data.Description: Ad tech company Criteo is searching for a new chief executive after Megan Clarken announced her pending exit.

data.Title: OpenAI Develops "Strawberry" Reasoning AI
data.Description: OpenAI is developing "Strawberry," a new reasoning AI capable of solving complex puzzles and generating synthetic data for model training.

data.Title: Gannett Shuts Down Product Reviews Site Reviewed
data.Description: Gannett has confirmed the shutdown of Reviewed, its product reviews site hosted on USAToday.com, impacting the affiliate marketing landscape.

data.Title: Anthropic Publishes "System Prompts" for Claude AI
data.Description: Anthropic has published the "system prompts" that guide its Claude AI models, providing transparency into the chatbot's capabilities and limitations.

data.Title: AlsoAsked Launches Timeline Feature for Tracking Search Intent Shift
data.Description: AlsoAsked introduces a Timeline feature that tracks search intent shift, allowing users to monitor changes in user queries and update content accordingly.

data.Title: Google Updates ProfilePage Structured Data Documentation
data.Description: Google has updated its developer documentation for ProfilePage structured data, providing guidance on improving website visibility in search results.

data.Title: Google's AI Overviews in Hindi Face Quality Concerns
data.Description: Google's AI-generated overviews in Hindi are facing criticism for inaccuracies, highlighting the challenges of language diversity in AI content creation.

data.Title: Microsoft Bing Copilot Accused of Defamation
data.Description: Microsoft's Bing Copilot AI chatbot has been accused of defamation after falsely attributing crimes to a reporter.

data.Title: Google Overhauls Video SEO Documentation
data.Description: Google has updated its video SEO documentation, clarifying video indexing criteria, technical requirements, and adding a new watch page section.

data.Title: Google May Use Open Graph Title for Search Result Snippets
data.Description: Google's updated documentation suggests that the Open Graph (OG) title tag may be used for title links in search result snippets.
